annotations.description: At Chicago's Three Dots and a Dash, Julian Cox puts a modern spin on the classic tiki drink, the Missionary's Downfall, with. “I love the combination
annotations.title: Three Dots and a Dash's Missionary's Downfall - PUNCH

textContent:
1 ounce white rum
1/2 ounce cr√©me de peche
1 ounce lime juice
1 dash honey
2 ounces pineapple
6-8 mint leaves

Muddle the mint in a shaker tin.
Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice.
Double strain into a coupe glass.
Garnish with a pineapple crescent and mint.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/three-dots-and-a-dash-missionarys-downfall/
title: Missionarys Downfall
